t: Amazon River | Facts, History, Location, Length, Animals, & Map | Britannica
s: July 24, 1998 - Amazon River, the greatest river of South America and the largest drainage system in the world in terms of the volume of its flow and the area of its basin. The total length of the river is at least 4,000 miles (6,400 km), which makes it slightly shorter than the Nile River.
